domain_model.plantuml:
@startuml
package LSF {
  class LSF
  class WaterRecyclingSubsystem
  class MonitoringDevice
  class DedicatedApplication
  class WaterStorageSubsystem
  class DisposalSystem
  class NonPerishableGoodsStorage
  class PerishableGoodsStorage
  class RefrigerationSystem
  class FreezerSystem
  class Sensor
  class PowerGenerationSubsystem
  class HVACSubsystem
  class WaterPurificationSubsystem
  class WasteManagementSubsystem
  class DrillingSubsystem
  class StorageAndMaintenanceSpace
  class ExpeditionEquipment
  class DrillingEquipment
  class HeavyMachinery
  class TransportVehicle
  class MaintenanceTool
  class EnvironmentalControl
  class IceCoreStorage
  class ScientificDataExchange
  class ResearchLab
  class Radio
  class McMurdoStation
  class Camera
  class Computer
  class EncryptedServer
  class CloudBasedStorage
  class ResearchTeam
  class WindowsPC
  class LC130Aircraft
  class C130HerculesAircraft
  class Helicopter
  class Truck
  class Sled
  class GroundVehicle

  LSF -- WaterRecyclingSubsystem : contains
  WaterRecyclingSubsystem o-- MonitoringDevice : includes
  MonitoringDevice --> DedicatedApplication : retrieves data via
  LSF -- WaterStorageSubsystem : contains
  WaterStorageSubsystem o-- MonitoringDevice : includes
  LSF -- DisposalSystem : contains
  LSF -- NonPerishableGoodsStorage : contains
  LSF -- PerishableGoodsStorage : contains
  PerishableGoodsStorage --> RefrigerationSystem : uses
  PerishableGoodsStorage --> FreezerSystem : uses
  Sensor --> PowerGenerationSubsystem : monitors
  Sensor --> HVACSubsystem : monitors
  Sensor --> WaterPurificationSubsystem : monitors
  Sensor --> WasteManagementSubsystem : monitors
  Sensor --> DrillingSubsystem : monitors
  LSF -- StorageAndMaintenanceSpace : contains
  StorageAndMaintenanceSpace o-- ExpeditionEquipment : stores
  StorageAndMaintenanceSpace o-- DrillingEquipment : stores
  StorageAndMaintenanceSpace o-- HeavyMachinery : stores
  StorageAndMaintenanceSpace o-- TransportVehicle : stores
  StorageAndMaintenanceSpace o-- MaintenanceTool : stores
  StorageAndMaintenanceSpace --> EnvironmentalControl : with environmental controls
  LSF -- IceCoreStorage : contains
  ScientificDataExchange --> ResearchLab : exchanges with
  LSF -- Radio : contains
  Radio --> McMurdoStation : communicates with
  LSF -- Camera : contains
  LSF -- Computer : contains
  Computer --> EncryptedServer : stores data on
  ResearchTeam --> CloudBasedStorage : establishes
  CloudBasedStorage --> LSF : accessible via World Wide Web
  ResearchTeam --> WindowsPC : interfaces with
  ResearchTeam --> Radio : interfaces with
  LSF --> LC130Aircraft : transportable by
  LSF --> C130HerculesAircraft : transportable by
  LSF --> Helicopter : transportable by
  LSF --> Truck : transportable by
  LSF --> Sled : transportable by
  Sled --> GroundVehicle : pulled by
}
@enduml

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall filter water in accordance with safety water standards defined by regulatory bodies.

issues.description: The term 'regulatory bodies' is vague and does not specify which agencies (e.g., EPA, WHO) set the safety water standards.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify the exact regulatory bodies or standards (e.g., EPA and WHO potable water standards) to be enforced.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall include a monitoring device that alerts the LSF when the filtering system requires change or maintenance, with data retrieved via a dedicated application.

issues.description: It is unclear which specific metrics or data points the dedicated application must retrieve.
issues.suggested_fix: Define the exact parameters (e.g., flow rate, filter pressure drop) that the dedicated application will retrieve and present.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall store potable, black, and gray water for occupants, meeting capacity requirements as defined in the Water Storage Tank SRS.

issues.description: Capacity is referenced to an external document (Water Storage Tank SRS), making direct testing unclear without that spec.
issues.suggested_fix: Include concrete numeric capacity values or ranges here (e.g., gallons or liters) rather than only referencing the external SRS.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Process waste. The facility shall implement a disposal system for trash and waste that remains effective under extreme weather conditions.

issues.description: The phrase 'extreme weather conditions' is not defined (e.g., temperature range, wind speed, precipitation).
issues.suggested_fix: Specify the exact environmental ranges (e.g., -40°F to 80°F, wind up to 70 mph) under which the disposal system must remain operational.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Store non-perishable and perishable goods. Non-perishable items shall be stored in a clean, dry environment near the kitchen, while perishable goods require adequate refrigeration/freezing capacity for extended periods.

issues.description: The term 'extended periods' is vague and lacks a defined duration (e.g., days, weeks).
issues.suggested_fix: Specify a minimum duration for perishable storage (e.g., 7 days at ≤4 °C).

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Monitor the health of critical equipment via a network of wired or wireless sensors covering systems such as power generation, HVAC, water purification, waste management, and drilling.

issues.description: The phrase 'such as' implies the list may be partial; it's unclear whether additional systems must be monitored.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify whether the enumerated systems are exhaustive or if other subsystems require sensors.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide sufficient storage and maintenance space for expedition and drilling equipment, including heavy machinery, transport vehicles, and maintenance tools, with appropriate environmental controls.

issues.description: The term 'sufficient storage and maintenance space' is undefined—no quantitative dimensions or volumes are provided.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify the required floor area or volume (e.g., at least 500 sq ft) and environmental control ranges (temperature, humidity).

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Support scientific data exchange with the US research lab through encrypted transmission.

issues.description: The encryption protocol, data formats, and exchange schedule are not specified.
issues.suggested_fix: Define encryption standards (e.g., AES-256), data schema (e.g., JSON, CSV), and transfer frequency.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least three computers to support data transmission, with data storage maintained on an encrypted server.

issues.description: The domain model relationship LSF->Computer uses multiplicity '*' and does not enforce the minimum of three computers.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the targetMultiplicity of LSF->Computer to '3..*' to reflect the minimum requirement.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The US-based Research Team shall establish cloud-based storage accessible by the facility via the World Wide Web.

issues.description: No details on storage capacity, security controls, or availability targets are provided.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify storage capacity (e.g., 1 TB), access control mechanisms, and uptime requirements (e.g., 99.9%).

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The LSF shall be designed for transportability by LC-130 or C-130 Hercules aircraft to McMurdo Station.

issues.description: No packaging, weight limits, or dimensional constraints are provided for air transport.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify maximum module dimensions and weights to ensure compatibility with aircraft cargo bays.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Provide accommodation with at least five beds and one mobile cot.

issues.description: No 'Accommodation' class or attributes exist to represent beds and cots.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce an 'Accommodation' class with attributes 'numBeds' and 'numMobileCots'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one shower.

issues.description: No 'Shower' class or attribute exists in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'Shower' class with a 'count' attribute under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one toilet.

issues.description: No 'Toilet' class or attribute exists in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'Toilet' class with a 'count' attribute under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least two sinks.

issues.description: No 'Sink' class or attribute exists in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'Sink' class with a 'count' attribute under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall provide laundry capability.

issues.description: The phrase 'laundry capability' is vague—unclear if it includes machines, drying space, or services.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify required equipment (e.g., number and capacity of washers and dryers) or service level.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one washing machine.

issues.description: No 'WashingMachine' class or attribute exists to represent this equipment.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a 'WashingMachine' class with a 'count' attribute under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one drying machine.

issues.description: No 'DryingMachine' class or attribute exists to represent this equipment.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a 'DryingMachine' class with a 'count' attribute under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be equipped with at least one first aid kit.

issues.description: No 'FirstAidKit' class or attribute exists to represent medical kits.
issues.suggested_fix: Create a 'FirstAidKit' class with a 'count' attribute under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least one set of AED defibrillators compliant with 29 CFR 1915.87 (OSHA Maritime).

issues.description: No 'AEDDefibrillator' class or compliance attribute exists.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce an 'AEDDefibrillator' class with a 'complianceStandard' attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for physical exercise.

issues.description: No 'PhysicalExerciseArea' class or attribute exists to model exercise space.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'PhysicalExerciseArea' class with an 'areaInSquareFeet' attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for eating.

issues.description: No 'DiningArea' class or attribute exists to model eating space.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a 'DiningArea' class with an 'areaInSquareFeet' attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one table and five chairs.

issues.description: No 'Table' or 'Chair' classes or attributes exist.
issues.suggested_fix: Create 'Table' and 'Chair' classes with 'count' attributes under LSF.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The refrigeration system shall provide at least 48 cubic feet of refrigeration space.

issues.description: The unit for 'capacity' is only in the description; it's not explicitly modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'unit' property or use a typed quantity for 'capacity' (e.g., Float + 'cubicFeet').

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The freezer system shall provide at least 19.5 cubic feet of freezer space.

issues.description: The unit for 'capacity' is not captured in the model.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'unit' property or use a typed quantity for 'capacity' (e.g., Float + 'cubicFeet').

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least a two-burner table-top stove.

issues.description: No 'Stove' class or attributes exist to represent cooking equipment.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a 'Stove' class with attributes 'numBurners' and 'type'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall monitor energy consumption using an electricity usage monitor.

issues.description: No 'ElectricityUsageMonitor' class or methods exist in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Create an 'ElectricityUsageMonitor' class with methods to log and report consumption.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall generate a daily report on energy consumption.

issues.description: No reporting or scheduling class/method exists for daily energy reports.
issues.suggested_fix: Add an 'EnergyReport' class with a 'frequency' attribute set to 'daily'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall conserve energy by utilizing motion sensor switches and outlets.

issues.description: No 'MotionSensorSwitch' or 'MotionSensorOutlet' classes exist to model energy-saving devices.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce 'MotionSensorSwitch' and 'MotionSensorOutlet' classes with associations to the power subsystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall store fuel in accordance with EPA's SPCC (40 CFR Part 112) requirements.

issues.description: No attribute represents SPCC compliance in the domain model.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a Boolean attribute 'spccCompliance' to the LSF class.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility structure shall support a roof load of 60 lbs per square foot for ice/snow buildup.

issues.description: The 'roofLoadCapacity' attribute is modeled as String; it should be a numeric type with units.
issues.suggested_fix: Change 'roofLoadCapacity' to Float or Quantity with unit 'lbsPerSquareFoot'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall store at least 150 lbs of food per week.

issues.description: No attribute or class models weekly food storage capacity in pounds.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'weeklyFoodStorageCapacity' attribute (Float with unit lbs) in a FoodStorage class.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The network shall support a minimum download speed of 12 Mbps.

issues.description: No network or connectivity class/attribute models download speed.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a 'NetworkConnectivity' class with attribute 'downloadSpeedMbps'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The network shall support a minimum upload speed of 3 Mbps.

issues.description: See REQ-045; upload speed attribute is missing.
issues.suggested_fix: Add 'uploadSpeedMbps' to 'NetworkConnectivity' class.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: All internet communications shall be encrypted.

issues.description: The encryption scope (TLS, VPN, application layer) is unspecified.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify required encryption protocols or standards for internet communications.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility's database shall be capable of accessing and identifying all files within the storage system.

issues.description: No 'Database' or 'File' classes exist to model file indexing and retrieval.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'Database' class with methods to index and retrieve 'File' entities.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall generate potable water that meets EPA and WHO standards.

issues.description: The specific EPA and WHO criteria (e.g., maximum contaminant levels) are not detailed.
issues.suggested_fix: List the exact EPA and WHO potable water standards (e.g., MCL values) to be met.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a network connection delivering an average WIFI speed of at least 25 Mbps throughout.

issues.description: No model element captures WiFi speed or coverage area.
issues.suggested_fix: Extend 'NetworkConnectivity' class with attributes 'wifiSpeedMbps' and 'coverageAreaSqFt'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall employ built-in tests (BIT) on power, heating, water filtration, electrical, and fire/CO systems.

issues.description: No built-in test functionality or BIT classes/methods are represented in the model.
issues.suggested_fix: Define a 'BuiltInTest' interface and implement it in each relevant subsystem class.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the power generation subsystem every 8 hours.

issues.description: No 'testInterval' attribute or scheduling mechanism exists for the power generation subsystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'testIntervalHours' attribute set to 8 in PowerGenerationSubsystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the heating equipment every 8 hours.

issues.description: The model monitors 'HVACSubsystem' but the requirement refers specifically to 'heating equipment'.
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify that HVACSubsystem includes heating or create a separate 'HeatingSubsystem'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the water filtration equipment every 24 hours.

issues.description: No 'testInterval' attribute exists for the water filtration or recycling subsystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Add 'testIntervalHours' = 24 to WaterRecyclingSubsystem or WaterPurificationSubsystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the electrical equipment every 8 hours.

issues.description: No 'ElectricalSubsystem' class is present, nor is any testing schedule modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce an 'ElectricalSubsystem' class with 'testIntervalHours' = 8.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the fire detecting equipment every hour.

issues.description: No 'FireDetectionSystem' class or hourly test scheduling is modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'FireDetectionSystem' class with 'testIntervalHours' = 1.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall test the carbon monoxide detecting equipment every hour.

issues.description: No 'COMonitoringSystem' class or test scheduling attribute exists.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'COMonitoringSystem' class with 'testIntervalHours' = 1.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Medical supplies shall be restocked weekly as needed.

issues.description: No 'MedicalSupplies' or restocking schedule class is modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Create a 'MedicalSuppliesStorage' class with a weekly restock schedule attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall not interrupt critical system functions.

issues.description: The term 'critical system functions' is not defined and no mechanism for non-interruption is specified.
issues.suggested_fix: List the critical functions and define fallback or redundancy mechanisms for updates.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall be executed manually.

issues.description: No update procedure or class exists to represent manual update execution.
issues.suggested_fix: Add an 'UpdateManager' class or procedure steps to model manual update operations.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility's control system shall be password protected.

issues.description: No 'ControlSystem' class exists to which password protection can be applied.
issues.suggested_fix: Introduce a 'ControlSystem' class with a Boolean 'passwordProtected' attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: All control panels shall be locked.

issues.description: No 'ControlPanel' class or 'isLocked' attribute is modeled.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'ControlPanel' class with a Boolean 'isLocked' attribute.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: Control panels shall be accessible only from within the facility.

issues.description: The boundary for 'within the facility' is not defined (physical vs. network access).
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify whether access is restricted physically or via network segmentation.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of routine maintenance for drilling or ice core analysis equipment via a monitoring device.

issues.description: MonitoringDevice is only associated with water subsystems, not DrillingSubsystem or IceCoreStorage.
issues.suggested_fix: Add aggregation or association between MonitoringDevice and DrillingSubsystem/IceCoreStorage.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The drilling equipment storage unit shall house replacement hardware.

issues.description: The term 'replacement hardware' is undefined; no inventory list is provided.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify the types or categories of replacement hardware to be stored.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed using Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) technology wherever possible.

issues.description: No guidance on which systems or under what conditions COTS should be used.
issues.suggested_fix: List subsystems intended for COTS implementation or criteria for selection.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The control system shall be operable via a stand-alone smart device (e.g., tablet) or from a dedicated control panel.

issues.description: No 'ControlSystem', 'SmartDevice', or interface classes exist to model this interaction.
issues.suggested_fix: Add 'ControlSystem' and 'SmartDevice' classes with interaction methods.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The crew shall monitor the control system using smart devices.

issues.description: No 'Crew' actor or 'SmartDevice' classes are modeled for monitoring interactions.
issues.suggested_fix: Define a 'Crew' actor and link to 'SmartDevice' for monitoring the ControlSystem.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The crew shall be able to control the facility via smart devices.

issues.description: Control endpoints and device interfaces are not represented in the model.
issues.suggested_fix: Implement control methods on 'ControlSystem' accessible by 'SmartDevice'.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The monitoring system shall include a fire-suppression system.

issues.description: No 'FireSuppressionSystem' class exists in the model.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'FireSuppressionSystem' class with activation and status methods.

requirement_issues.requirement_text: The potable water system shall feature a visible display of pH level.

issues.description: No attribute or method models a pH display on any water subsystem.
issues.suggested_fix: Add a 'phDisplay' Boolean attribute and a 'displayPH()' method on WaterPurificationSubsystem.

domain_model_issues.description: Modeled as String; should be a numeric type with units (lbs/ft²).
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Change type to Float with a unit annotation 'lbsPerSquareFoot'.

domain_model_issues.description: Missing 'safetyWaterStandards' attribute though potable water standards are required.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Move or duplicate 'safetyWaterStandards' from WaterRecyclingSubsystem to WaterPurificationSubsystem.

domain_model_issues.description: No composition relationship links LSF to ScientificDataExchange for encrypted data exchange.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add a composition from LSF to ScientificDataExchange.

domain_model_issues.description: Multiplicity '*' does not enforce the minimum of three computers.
No class to represent sleeping accommodation (beds and cots).
Domain model lacks a 'Shower' class for sanitation requirements.
Domain model lacks a 'Toilet' class to represent facility toilets.
No 'Sink' class exists for modeling sinks.
Facility requires a washing machine but model lacks the class.
No 'DryingMachine' class to represent drying capability.
First aid kits are required but no model exists for them.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add 'FirstAidKit' class with 'count' and compliance attributes.

domain_model_issues.description: No class models AED defibrillators or compliance to OSHA maritime standards.
No class models exercise area or space attributes.
No 'DiningArea' class for eating space.
No 'Table' class for furniture requirements.
No 'Chair' class for furniture requirements.
Cooking equipment is not modeled; no 'Stove' class.
No class for monitoring electrical energy consumption.
No reporting mechanism or class for energy consumption reports.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add 'EnergyReport' class with report generation method and frequency.

domain_model_issues.description: Energy conservation devices are not modeled; no motion sensor switches.
No 'MotionSensorOutlet' class to represent sensor-controlled outlets.
SPCC compliance attribute is not present despite fuel storage requirements.
Download speed attribute is missing from any network model.
Upload speed attribute is missing.
WiFi-specific speed attribute is not modeled.
No 'Database' class to represent file indexing and retrieval.
No generic BIT interface or class exists for built-in tests.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Define a 'BuiltInTest' interface implemented by subsystems.

domain_model_issues.description: No 'ElectricalSubsystem' class to represent electrical equipment.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce 'ElectricalSubsystem' with appropriate monitoring and testing methods.

domain_model_issues.description: No 'FireDetectionSystem' class for fire equipment.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add 'FireDetectionSystem' with testing and notification methods.

domain_model_issues.description: No class models CO detection or monitoring.
No class models medical supplies or restocking schedules.
No class models manual software/firmware update process.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add 'UpdateManager' with methods to schedule and execute manual updates.

domain_model_issues.description: No 'ControlSystem' class exists for password protection and device control.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce 'ControlSystem' with security attributes and control methods.

domain_model_issues.description: No 'ControlPanel' class to model physical control interfaces and locks.
No 'SmartDevice' class to represent tablets or remote control devices.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Introduce 'SmartDevice' with connectivity methods to ControlSystem.

domain_model_issues.description: Domain model lacks a class for fire suppression capabilities.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add 'FireSuppressionSystem' with activation and monitoring methods.

domain_model_issues.description: No attribute or method models pH display on water purification equipment.
Two classes represent waste handling with overlapping semantics.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Unify under a single 'WasteManagementSubsystem' or clarify their distinct responsibilities.

domain_model_issues.description: Filtering behavior is implemented in WaterRecyclingSubsystem while potable water is handled in WaterPurificationSubsystem.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Consolidate filtration methods under the appropriate subsystem class (e.g., WaterPurificationSubsystem).

domain_model_issues.description: MonitoringDevice is not linked to DrillingSubsystem or IceCoreStorage for maintenance notifications.
domain_model_issues.suggested_fix: Add associations or aggregations between MonitoringDevice and these classes.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies the power generation subsystem’s capacity or performance.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The power generation subsystem shall supply continuous electrical power sufficient to operate all critical life‐support, communication, and data processing systems concurrently, with a minimum capacity of 10 kW.
missing_requirements.rationale: The domain model includes PowerGenerationSubsystem, but the requirements set does not define how much power the facility must generate to support its systems.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement defines the environmental control performance of the HVAC subsystem.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The HVAC subsystem shall maintain interior ambient temperature between 68°F and 75°F and relative humidity between 30% and 60% under all operating conditions.
missing_requirements.rationale: HVACSubsystem is in the domain model and monitored for failure, but there are no requirements specifying the temperature or humidity ranges it must maintain.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement details the water purification subsystem’s treatment performance.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The water purification subsystem shall remove at least 99.9% of bacteria and viruses and reduce chemical contaminants to below EPA and WHO potable water thresholds.
missing_requirements.rationale: Although the facility must generate potable water (REQ-058), the domain model defines a WaterPurificationSubsystem that has no explicit performance or treatment requirements.

missing_requirements.description: Sensors lack requirements for self-test and calibration routines.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: Each sensor shall perform an automated self-test and calibration cycle at startup and at least once every 24 hours, reporting its operational status to the LSF monitoring system.
missing_requirements.rationale: The domain model includes a Sensor class with a monitorHealth method, but the requirements only cover monitoring health, not ensuring sensor integrity or calibration.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement specifies conditions to be maintained by environmental controls in storage/maintenance space.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: Environmental controls for the storage and maintenance space shall maintain temperature between 32°F and 77°F and relative humidity between 30% and 50% to protect stored equipment.
missing_requirements.rationale: The domain model associates EnvironmentalControl with StorageAndMaintenanceSpace, but the requirements only state that environmental controls exist without defining their performance.

missing_requirements.description: The waste management subsystem’s separation, compaction, and grey-water treatment functions are not specified.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The waste management subsystem shall separate, compact, and store solid waste in sealed containers, and shall treat grey water to meet effluent standards before disposal.
missing_requirements.rationale: The domain model contains a WasteManagementSubsystem in addition to DisposalSystem, but the requirements only cover trash and waste under extreme weather, not waste stream separation or grey-water treatment.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement addresses the drilling subsystem’s operational capabilities.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The drilling subsystem shall be capable of drilling ice cores to depths of up to 1,000 meters and recover core samples with a minimum diameter of 10 centimeters.
missing_requirements.rationale: DrillingSubsystem appears in the domain model and is monitored for maintenance, but there is no requirement defining its drilling performance or capabilities.

missing_requirements.description: Internal network communications are not required to be encrypted.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: All internal network communications between subsystems, sensors, and monitoring devices shall be encrypted using TLS 1.2 or higher.
missing_requirements.rationale: REQ-047 mandates encryption for internet communications, but there is no equivalent requirement for internal subsystem traffic, which could expose sensitive data.

missing_requirements.description: No requirement defines logging and retention of system events and maintenance actions.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The system shall log all equipment status changes, maintenance actions, and alarm events, storing logs securely on the encrypted server for a minimum of one year.
missing_requirements.rationale: EncryptedServer and Computers exist in the domain model to store data, but requirements do not address audit logging or data retention.

missing_requirements.description: The camera’s video performance specifications are not defined.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The camera shall support video conferencing at a minimum resolution of 1080p at 30 frames per second and include a wide-angle lens with at least a 90° field of view.
missing_requirements.rationale: The domain model includes Camera for video conferencing, and REQ-015 requires at least one camera, but no performance criteria are given.

missing_requirements.description: System availability targets for control and monitoring are not specified.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The control and monitoring system shall achieve at least 99.9% uptime, excluding scheduled maintenance periods.
missing_requirements.rationale: Continuous operation (REQ-060) covers the facility, but there is no availability requirement for the software and services that manage and monitor it.

missing_requirements.description: Inventory tracking and low-stock alerts for non-perishable goods are missing.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The system shall track inventory levels of non-perishable goods and notify the crew when supplies fall below predefined reorder thresholds.
missing_requirements.rationale: NonPerishableGoodsStorage is modeled, and REQ-007 covers storage environment, but there is no facility for managing inventory levels over time.

missing_requirements.description: Data-at-rest encryption strength is not specified.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: All data stored on the encrypted server and in cloud-based storage shall be encrypted at rest using AES-256.
missing_requirements.rationale: REQ-047 mandates encryption for internet communications, and REQ-016 requires encrypted server storage, but the standard and strength of encryption for data at rest are not defined.

missing_requirements.description: Leak detection and reporting are not required for the water storage subsystem.
missing_requirements.suggested_requirement: The water storage subsystem shall detect and report any leaks or pressure drops within five minutes of occurrence via its monitoring device.
missing_requirements.rationale: MonitoringDevice is aggregated by WaterStorageSubsystem and communicates water quality, but there is no requirement for detecting or reporting physical leaks.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall filter water in accordance with safety water standards defined by regulatory bodies.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-002 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Water Systems Engineer] [Rationale: Ensure potable water meets regulatory safety limits] [Status: Draft] The water recycling subsystem shall filter water in accordance with safety water standards defined by regulatory bodies. [Acceptance Criteria: Filtered water turbidity < 1 NTU and microbial count < X CFU/ml.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including priority, rationale, source, status, version and acceptance criteria ensures the requirement is testable, traceable and properly managed.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water recycling subsystem shall include a monitoring device that alerts the LSF when the filtering system requires change or maintenance, with data retrieved via a dedicated application.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-003 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Operations Manager] [Rationale: Prevent downtime through proactive alerts] [Status: Draft] The water recycling subsystem shall include a monitoring device that alerts the LSF when the filtering system requires change or maintenance, with data retrieved via a dedicated application. [Acceptance Criteria: Alerts issued within 1 minute of threshold breach; data retrieval successful 99% of attempts.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding missing metadata and testable criteria improves clarity on performance expectations and project tracking.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall store potable, black, and gray water for occupants, meeting capacity requirements as defined in the Water Storage Tank SRS.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-004 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Document: Water Storage Tank SRS] [Rationale: Ensure sufficient water capacity] [Status: Draft] The water storage subsystem shall store potable, black, and gray water for occupants, meeting capacity requirements as defined in the Water Storage Tank SRS. [Acceptance Criteria: Potable tank capacity ≥ X gallons; black/gray tanks each ≥ Y gallons; no cross-contamination detected.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Metadata and acceptance criteria are needed for verification, traceability, and to satisfy stakeholder expectations.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The water storage subsystem shall include a monitoring device that communicates water quality and contamination levels to the LSF.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-005 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Health & Safety Officer] [Rationale: Maintain potable water safety] [Status: Draft] The water storage subsystem shall include a monitoring device that communicates water quality and contamination levels to the LSF. [Acceptance Criteria: Quality data updates every 5 minutes; alarm if contaminant level exceeds threshold X.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining acceptance criteria and metadata ensures the requirement can be validated and prioritized.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Process waste. The facility shall implement a disposal system for trash and waste that remains effective under extreme weather conditions.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-006 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Environmental Engineer] [Rationale: Ensure continuous waste management in Antarctica] [Status: Draft] The facility shall implement a disposal system for trash and waste that remains effective under extreme weather conditions. [Acceptance Criteria: System operational at −40°F; no service interruptions over 72-hour storm.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Metadata and measurable criteria clarify how performance will be evaluated and managed.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Store non-perishable and perishable goods. Non-perishable items shall be stored in a clean, dry environment near the kitchen, while perishable goods require adequate refrigeration/freezing capacity for extended periods.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-007 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Logistics Coordinator] [Rationale: Ensure food safety and accessibility] [Status: Draft] Non-perishable items shall be stored in a clean, dry environment near the kitchen; perishable goods require refrigeration ≥48 cu ft and freezing ≥19.5 cu ft for up to 30 days. [Acceptance Criteria: Temperature maintained at 35–40°F for fridge, −10 to 0°F for freezer; humidity < 50%.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying numeric limits, test criteria, and metadata improves verifiability and planning.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Monitor the health of critical equipment via a network of wired or wireless sensors covering systems such as power generation, HVAC, water purification, waste management, and drilling.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-009 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Lead] [Rationale: Enable predictive maintenance and reduce downtime] [Status: Draft] Monitor the health of critical equipment via a network of wired or wireless sensors covering power generation, HVAC, water purification, waste management, and drilling. [Acceptance Criteria: Sensor uptime ≥99%; health data latency ≤2 sec; alerts when metric deviates >5% from nominal.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding performance targets and metadata supports system design and testing.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide sufficient storage and maintenance space for expedition and drilling equipment, including heavy machinery, transport vehicles, and maintenance tools, with appropriate environmental controls.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-010 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Operations Planner] [Rationale: Ensure equipment readiness and preservation] [Status: Draft] Provide storage and maintenance space sized ≥1000 sq ft, with temperature 32–50°F, humidity 30–60%, and ventilation ≥6 ACH for expedition and drilling equipment including heavy machinery, vehicles, and tools. [Acceptance Criteria: Environmental controls maintain setpoints ±5%.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining size, environmental parameters, and acceptance criteria makes the requirement actionable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Store ice cores. The facility shall be capable of simultaneously storing 20 ice cores at temperatures maintained between -40°F and 20°F.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-011 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Science Lead] [Rationale: Preserve sample integrity for analysis] [Status: Draft] The facility shall store 20 ice cores simultaneously at stable temperatures between −40°F and 20°F. [Acceptance Criteria: Temperature stability ±2°F over 30 days; capacity verified by physical count.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding testable criteria and metadata ensures the design meets scientific needs.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Support scientific data exchange with the US research lab through encrypted transmission.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-013 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: IT Director] [Rationale: Protect data confidentiality during exchange] [Status: Draft] Support encrypted transmission of scientific data between the facility and the US research lab. [Acceptance Criteria: Data encryption AES-256; throughput ≥5 Mbps; end-to-end latency ≤200 ms.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying encryption standard, performance targets and metadata makes the requirement verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least one radio for communication with McMurdo Station, which must operate on battery backup, feature a hand-crank function, and utilize solar power.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-014 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Communications Officer] [Rationale: Ensure redundant comms to McMurdo Station] [Status: Draft] The LSF shall contain ≥1 radio that communicates with McMurdo Station, operates on battery backup for ≥72 hours, features a hand-crank function, and utilizes solar charging at ≥5 W. [Acceptance Criteria: Successful message transmission in daylight and darkness.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining numeric requirements and acceptance criteria ensures reliability under diverse conditions.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least one camera for video conferencing.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-015 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: End-User Representative] [Rationale: Facilitate remote collaboration] [Status: Draft] The LSF shall contain ≥1 camera for video conferencing at 1080p/30fps. [Acceptance Criteria: Video call latency ≤150 ms; image resolution ≥1920×1080.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding technical and performance details along with metadata makes the requirement testable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall contain at least three computers to support data transmission, with data storage maintained on an encrypted server.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-016 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: IT Manager] [Rationale: Provide sufficient processing capacity] [Status: Draft] The LSF shall contain ≥3 computers supporting ≥Ethernet 1Gbps for data transmission, with all data stored on an encrypted server using AES-256. [Acceptance Criteria: File transfer speeds ≥200 MB/s; encryption verified in audit.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining performance metrics and security standards ensures compliance and usability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The US-based Research Team shall establish cloud-based storage accessible by the facility via the World Wide Web.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-017 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Research Coordinator] [Rationale: Enable remote data access] [Status: Draft] The US-based Research Team shall establish cloud-based storage accessible via HTTPS by the facility with 99.9% availability SLA. [Acceptance Criteria: Service uptime logs; access latency ≤200 ms.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying availability targets, protocols and metadata clarifies expectations.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The Research Team shall interface directly with a dedicated Windows PC and the radio system.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-018 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Research Team Lead] [Rationale: Simplify user interfaces] [Status: Draft] The Research Team shall interface directly with a dedicated Windows PC (Windows 10 or later) and the radio system via provided GUIs. [Acceptance Criteria: Successful user authentication; radio comms established in ≤30 s.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding system versions, GUI requirements and test criteria ensures usability and compatibility.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall be designed for transportability by LC-130 or C-130 Hercules aircraft to McMurdo Station.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-019 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Logistics Planner] [Rationale: Ensure deployment capability] [Status: Draft] The LSF shall be designed to fit within LC-130/C-130 Hercules cargo dimensions (88×9×8 ft) and weight limits (42,000 lbs) for transport to McMurdo Station. [Acceptance Criteria: Demonstrated load test and weight report.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining dimensional and weight limits with acceptance criteria ensures deployability verification.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The LSF shall also be designed for transport by helicopter, truck, or sleds pulled by ground vehicles.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-020 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Field Operations] [Rationale: Provide deployment flexibility] [Status: Draft] The LSF shall be transportable by helicopter (payload ≥5,000 lbs), truck (width ≤8.5 ft, height ≤9 ft), or sleds (modular ≤40 ft sections) pulled by ground vehicles. [Acceptance Criteria: Fit and weight validated in field trial.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Detailed transport parameters and acceptance criteria enable practical verification.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Provide accommodation with at least five beds and one mobile cot.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-021 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Welfare Officer] [Rationale: Ensure adequate sleeping capacity] [Status: Draft] Provide accommodation with ≥5 beds and ≥1 mobile cot, each meeting ANSI/NFPA sleep safety standards. [Acceptance Criteria: Space per occupant ≥50 sq ft; beds meet fire codes.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding standards references and test metrics strengthens safety and usability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one shower.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-022 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Welfare Officer] [Rationale: Provide hygiene facilities] [Status: Draft] The facility shall include ≥1 shower with water flow ≥2.5 gpm and temperature control 100–120°F. [Acceptance Criteria: Flow and temperature within 10% of setpoints.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying flow and temperature requirements and metadata ensures user comfort and testability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one toilet.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least two sinks.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall provide laundry capability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one washing machine.

[Acceptance Criteria: Machine operates within specified ratings over 30 cycles.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining capacity, efficiency and test criteria makes the requirement verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one drying machine.

[Acceptance Criteria: Residual moisture ≤10%; energy ≤300 Wh/cycle.]

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be equipped with at least one first aid kit.

[Acceptance Criteria: Kit inventory matches OSHA checklist; restocked monthly.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying contents, standards and replenishment criteria ensures readiness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall have at least one set of AED defibrillators compliant with 29 CFR 1915.87 (OSHA Maritime).
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-029 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Medical Officer] [Rationale: Ensure compliance and crew safety] [Status: Draft] The facility shall have ≥1 AED defibrillator compliant with 29 CFR 1915.87, with battery charged and electrodes within expiry. requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for physical exercise.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-030 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Health & Wellness Officer] [Rationale: Support crew fitness and morale] [Status: Draft] The facility shall provide ≥100 sq ft of exercise space with ceiling height ≥8 ft and non-slip flooring. [Acceptance Criteria: Measurement verification; flooring meets slip resistance standard.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying dimensions, flooring and acceptance criteria enhances usability and safety.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a minimum of 100 square feet of space for eating.

[Acceptance Criteria: Area measurement; lighting tests.]

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least one table and five chairs.

[Acceptance Criteria: Furniture load test; dimensions verified.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining dimensions, load capacity and test criteria ensures durability and comfort.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The refrigeration system shall provide at least 48 cubic feet of refrigeration space.

[Acceptance Criteria: Volume verified; temperature stability test over 24 hours.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including environmental tolerances and test criteria makes the requirement actionable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The freezer system shall provide at least 19.5 cubic feet of freezer space.

[Acceptance Criteria: Volume and temperature tests over 24 hours.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining temperature range and acceptance criteria ensures preservation requirements are met.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall include at least a two-burner table-top stove.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-036 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Culinary Lead] [Rationale: Provide cooking capability] [Status: Draft] The facility shall include ≥1 two-burner tabletop stove with burners rated ≥5,000 BTU each and safety shutoff. [Acceptance Criteria: Burners achieve full flame in ≤30 s; safety shutoff test.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying performance and safety criteria clarifies functional and test requirements.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall monitor energy consumption using an electricity usage monitor.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-037 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Energy Manager] [Rationale: Track and optimize power usage] [Status: Draft] The facility shall monitor real-time energy consumption via an electricity usage monitor with sampling interval ≤1 minute and accuracy ±2%. [Acceptance Criteria: Data logged at 1-minute intervals; accuracy verified against calibration standard.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including accuracy, interval and acceptance criteria ensures meaningful energy monitoring.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall generate a daily report on energy consumption.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-038 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Energy Manager] [Rationale: Provide operational insight] [Status: Draft] The facility shall generate and distribute a daily energy consumption report by 06:00 local time, including total kWh, peak demand, and trending graphs. [Acceptance Criteria: Report delivered to stakeholders via email; data completeness ≥99%.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining report contents, delivery time and success metrics makes the requirement verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall conserve energy by utilizing motion sensor switches and outlets.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-039 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Sustainability Officer] [Rationale: Reduce unnecessary energy use] [Status: Draft] The facility shall use motion sensor switches/outlets to turn off lights/equipment after 5 minutes of no motion, with false-off rate <5%. [Acceptance Criteria: Sensor activation/deactivation tested over 100 cycles.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying timeout and performance metrics ensures expected energy savings.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall store fuel in accordance with EPA's SPCC (40 CFR Part 112) requirements.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-040 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Regulation: EPA SPCC 40 CFR Part 112] [Rationale: Prevent oil spills and environmental damage] [Status: Draft] The facility shall store all fuel following EPA SPCC requirements, including secondary containment ≥110% of tank volume and leak detection. [Acceptance Criteria: Secondary containment capacity verified; leak test monthly.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including specific regulatory references and test criteria ensures compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall withstand ambient temperatures from -40°F to 80°F.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-042 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Structural Engineer] [Rationale: Ensure operation in Antarctic conditions] [Status: Draft] The facility shall maintain full functionality and material integrity at ambient temperatures from −40°F to 80°F. [Acceptance Criteria: Functional test at −40°F and 80°F for 24 hours; structural inspection post-test.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining test conditions and acceptance criteria validates environmental resilience.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility structure shall support a roof load of 60 lbs per square foot for ice/snow buildup.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-043 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Structural Engineer] [Rationale: Prevent collapse under snow/ice loads] [Status: Draft] The facility structure shall support roof loads ≥60 lb/ft² for ice/snow buildup with safety factor ≥1.5. [Acceptance Criteria: Structural load test at 90 lb/ft²; no failure.]

[Acceptance Criteria: Weekly inventory audit; temperature/humidity compliance.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Linking to existing storage requirements and adding audit criteria improves traceability and verification.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The network shall support a minimum download speed of 12 Mbps.

[Acceptance Criteria: 24-hour speed test showing ≥12 Mbps 95% of time.]

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The network shall support a minimum upload speed of 3 Mbps.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-046 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: IT Manager] [Rationale: Support data transmission needs] [Status: Draft] The network shall support sustained upload speeds ≥3 Mbps with latency ≤100 ms. [Acceptance Criteria: 24-hour speed test showing ≥3 Mbps 95% of time.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying test conditions ensures this performance can be validated.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: All internet communications shall be encrypted.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility's database shall be capable of accessing and identifying all files within the storage system.
