[Acceptance Criteria: Quarterly report showing compliance metrics.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including specific policy metrics and reporting criteria ensures measurable compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall adhere to the 30-50-75 Environmental Effects Abroad of Major Agency Actions.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-050 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Regulation: CEQ Policy] [Rationale: Fulfill international environmental standards] [Status: Draft] The facility shall comply with the 30-50-75 policy: 30% mitigation, 50% minimization, 75% monitoring. [Acceptance Criteria: Semi-annual environmental audit reports.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding policy parameters and audit criteria makes compliance verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the environmental protection protocol of the Antarctic Treaty.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-051 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Treaty Document] [Rationale: Protect Antarctic environment] [Status: Draft] The facility shall meet all requirements of the Antarctic Treaty Environmental Protocol, including waste management and species protection. [Acceptance Criteria: External environmental compliance review.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying review processes and referencing treaty sections ensures full compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall comply with Title 21, Chapter I, Subchapters A, B, C, and D of the Federal Drug Administration.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-052 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Regulation: FDA Title 21] [Rationale: Ensure pharmaceutical safety] [Status: Draft] The facility shall comply with FDA Title 21, Chapter I, Subchapters A–D for drug storage, handling, and documentation. [Acceptance Criteria: Compliance audit by certified FDA inspector.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding audit requirements and references clarifies how compliance is measured.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed and built in accordance with applicable OSHA regulations, including fall protection, hazard communication, respiratory protection, scaffolding, ladder safety, control of hazardous energy, eye and face protection, and machinery guarding.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-053 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Regulation: OSHA CFR] [Rationale: Ensure workplace safety] [Status: Draft] The facility shall meet OSHA standards for fall protection (1926.501), hazard communication (1910.1200), respiratory protection (1910.134), scaffolding (1926 Subpart L), ladder safety (1926.1053), lockout/tagout (1910.147), eye/face protection (1910.133), and machine guarding (1910.212). [Acceptance Criteria: Annual OSHA compliance audit.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Referencing exact OSHA sections and audit criteria ensures thorough safety compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the 2021 International Building Code.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-054 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Regulation: IBC 2021] [Rationale: Ensure structural safety and code compliance] [Status: Draft] The facility design shall fully comply with the 2021 International Building Code. [Acceptance Criteria: Third-party code compliance review.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying review deliverables ensures code adherence is verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the 2021 Fire Code.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-055 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Regulation: IFC 2021] [Rationale: Ensure fire safety] [Status: Draft] The facility shall comply with the 2021 International Fire Code. [Acceptance Criteria: Fire code compliance certification.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including certification clarifies how compliance will be demonstrated.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed in accordance with the Fuel Gas Code.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-056 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Regulation: Fuel Gas Code] [Rationale: Ensure safe fuel gas installation] [Status: Draft] The facility shall comply with the Fuel Gas Code for design, installation, and testing of gas systems. [Acceptance Criteria: Gas system pressure test ≤1% leakage over 1 hour.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying test criteria ensures fuel gas safety and compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility's communication protocols shall comply with US Federal Code of Regulations - Title 47.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-057 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Regulation: CFR Title 47] [Rationale: Ensure lawful radio communications] [Status: Draft] All facility communication protocols shall comply with CFR Title 47, Parts 101–199. [Acceptance Criteria: Protocol stack audit; no non-compliant packets detected.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including audit procedures ensures regulatory compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall generate potable water that meets EPA and WHO standards.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-058 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Regulation: EPA & WHO] [Rationale: Ensure safe drinking water] [Status: Draft] The facility shall produce potable water meeting EPA SDW standards and WHO guidelines, including turbidity <1 NTU and contaminants <X ppb. [Acceptance Criteria: Monthly lab tests; 100% compliance.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding specific water quality metrics and testing schedule makes the requirement verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall meet MIL-STD-1366 Transportability Criteria.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-059 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Standard: MIL-STD-1366] [Rationale: Ensure military transport compatibility] [Status: Draft] The facility shall conform to MIL-STD-1366 for weight, dimensions, tie-down, and handling. [Acceptance Criteria: Transportability test certification.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Referencing the standard and test certification clarifies compliance verification.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall operate 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-060 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Operations Manager] [Rationale: Provide continuous life support services] [Status: Draft] The facility and all critical subsystems shall operate continuously 24/7 with system uptime ≥99.9% per month. [Acceptance Criteria: Uptime reports; no more than 43.2 minutes downtime/month.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining uptime metrics and acceptance criteria ensures continuous operation goals are measurable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall provide a network connection delivering an average WIFI speed of at least 25 Mbps throughout.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-061 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: IT Manager] [Rationale: Support bandwidth-intensive applications] [Status: Draft] The facility shall provide Wi-Fi with average throughput ≥25 Mbps per user and coverage ≥95% of occupied areas. [Acceptance Criteria: Speed tests at 10 locations; ≥25 Mbps 95% of samples.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying coverage and test methodology ensures desired performance is achieved.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any heating equipment failures within 1 minute.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-062 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Rapid response to maintain survivable temperatures] [Status: Draft] The facility shall detect and notify occupants of heating equipment failures within 1 minute via alarm and display. [Acceptance Criteria: Failure injection test; notification delivered in ≤60 seconds 100% of times.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including test procedure and performance target ensures reliability of failure alerts.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any climate control system failures within 1 minute.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-063 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Prevent environmental conditions from becoming hazardous] [Status: Draft] The facility shall detect and notify occupants of climate control failures within 1 minute via alarm and display. [Acceptance Criteria: Simulated failure; notification in ≤60 seconds 100% of tests.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining test scenarios and metrics verifies timely alerts.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any water filtration equipment failures within 1 minute.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-064 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Maintain water safety and supply continuity] [Status: Draft] The facility shall detect and notify occupants of water filtration failures within 1 minute via alarm and display. [Acceptance Criteria: Fault injection; notification in ≤60 seconds 100% of tests.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining test actions and metrics ensures reliability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall remind occupants to replace water and air filters as per the manufacturer's instructions.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-065 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Manager] [Rationale: Ensure timely filter replacement for system health] [Status: Draft] The facility shall generate reminders for water/air filter replacement based on manufacturer intervals via display and email. [Acceptance Criteria: Reminder issued within ±1 day of due date for 100% of filters.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding timing and delivery criteria ensures maintenance actions are performed on schedule.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of any fire or carbon monoxide equipment failures within 1 minute.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-066 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Ensure rapid response to life-threatening failures] [Status: Draft] The facility shall detect and notify occupants of fire or CO equipment failures within 1 minute via audible alarm and visual indicator. [Acceptance Criteria: Simulated failure tests; notification in ≤60 seconds 100% of times.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining test procedure and performance metrics verifies alert system effectiveness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall employ built-in tests (BIT) on power, heating, water filtration, electrical, and fire/CO systems.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-067 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: QA Lead] [Rationale: Automate health checks] [Status: Draft] The facility control system shall perform BIT on power, heating, water filtration, electrical, and fire/CO systems every hour and report results. [Acceptance Criteria: BIT execution time ≤2 min; fault log generated if any test fails.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying intervals and logging requirements ensures automated self-test effectiveness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the power generation subsystem every 8 hours.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-068 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Lead] [Rationale: Ensure continuous power availability] [Status: Draft] The facility shall perform an automated functional test of the power generation subsystem every 8 hours, verifying output ≥X kW. [Acceptance Criteria: Test log entries; output within ±5% of nominal.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including test frequency and performance thresholds ensures reliability.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the heating equipment every 8 hours.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-069 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Lead] [Rationale: Prevent system degradation] [Status: Draft] The facility shall perform automated heating equipment tests every 8 hours, verifying temperature rise of ≥X°F. [Acceptance Criteria: Test results logged; temperature within ±5% of setpoint.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining metrics and logging ensures heating functionality checks are effective.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the water filtration equipment every 24 hours.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-070 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Lead] [Rationale: Maintain water quality standards] [Status: Draft] The facility shall perform an automated water filtration equipment test every 24 hours, verifying flow rate ≥X GPM and turbidity <Y NTU. [Acceptance Criteria: Daily test logs; parameters within thresholds.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying test parameters and acceptance thresholds ensures water quality is maintained.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the electrical equipment every 8 hours.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-071 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Lead] [Rationale: Detect electrical faults early] [Status: Draft] The facility shall perform automated electrical equipment checks every 8 hours, ensuring voltage and current within ±5% of nominal. [Acceptance Criteria: Test log with no out-of-tolerance readings.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including electrical tolerances and test intervals makes the requirement verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the fire detecting equipment every hour.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-072 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Guarantee fire detection reliability] [Status: Draft] The facility shall perform an automated test of fire detection sensors every hour, verifying alarm activation and sensor response time ≤5 s. [Acceptance Criteria: Hourly test logs; response time within threshold.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining response time and logging ensures fire detection readiness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall test the carbon monoxide detecting equipment every hour.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-073 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Ensure CO detection reliability] [Status: Draft] The facility shall perform hourly automated tests on CO detectors, verifying alarm activation and response time ≤5 s. [Acceptance Criteria: Hourly test logs; response within threshold.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying response metrics ensures occupant safety is maintained.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Medical supplies shall be restocked weekly as needed.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-074 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Medical Officer] [Rationale: Keep first aid kits stocked] [Status: Draft] Medical supplies shall be audited and restocked weekly, ensuring inventory levels meet minimum usage thresholds. [Acceptance Criteria: Weekly inventory report; 100% of required items in stock.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding audit and inventory criteria ensures medical readiness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall not interrupt critical system functions.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-075 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: IT Security Lead] [Rationale: Maintain operational availability] [Status: Draft] Software/firmware updates shall be applied without interrupting critical functions, using rolling or staged deployment. [Acceptance Criteria: No downtime in simulated update scenario.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining deployment strategy and test scenario ensures continuous operation.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Software and firmware updates shall be executed manually.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-076 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: IT Security Lead] [Rationale: Ensure controlled update process] [Status: Draft] Software/firmware updates shall require manual approval before deployment, with version rollback capability. [Acceptance Criteria: Manual sign-off logs; rollback tested.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including approval and rollback criteria ensures controlled updates.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility's control system shall be password protected.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-077 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Security Officer] [Rationale: Prevent unauthorized access] [Status: Draft] The control system shall require unique user credentials with password complexity ≥8 chars, one uppercase, one digit, and expire every 90 days. [Acceptance Criteria: Password policy enforcement verified in audit.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining password rules and audit criteria strengthens security.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: All control panels shall be locked.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-078 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Security Officer] [Rationale: Prevent unauthorized tampering] [Status: Draft] All control panels shall be lockable with tamper-evident seals and access logs. [Acceptance Criteria: Physical inspection; tamper log audit monthly.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying lock type and audit ensures tamper prevention.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: Control panels shall be accessible only from within the facility.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-079 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Security Officer] [Rationale: Restrict external access] [Status: Draft] Control panels shall be installed indoors, accessible only via facility interior security doors. [Acceptance Criteria: Physical inspection; no external panel access points.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Clarifying access restrictions and acceptance checks ensures compliance.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall notify occupants of routine maintenance for drilling or ice core analysis equipment via a monitoring device.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-080 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Manager] [Rationale: Ensure scheduled maintenance is performed] [Status: Draft] The facility shall use a monitoring device to notify occupants of routine maintenance for drilling and ice core analysis equipment at manufacturer-recommended intervals. [Acceptance Criteria: Notifications issued ≥24 hours before due date.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying intervals and delivery timing ensures maintenance tasks are not missed.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The drilling equipment storage unit shall house replacement hardware.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-081 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Maintenance Manager] [Rationale: Ensure spare parts availability] [Status: Draft] The drilling equipment storage unit shall house replacement hardware, including at minimum 2 sets of drill bits, spare motors, and connectors. [Acceptance Criteria: Inventory audit; all listed spares present.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding content list, condition and acceptance criteria ensures the storage requirement is specific and verifiable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The facility shall be designed using Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) technology wherever possible.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-082 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Systems Architect] [Rationale: Reduce cost and integration risk] [Status: Draft] The facility design shall maximize use of COTS components with COTS compliance ≥80%. [Acceptance Criteria: Bill of materials showing ≥80% COTS; integration test results.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining a COTS usage target and acceptance criteria makes the requirement measurable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The control system shall be operable via a stand-alone smart device (e.g., tablet) or from a dedicated control panel.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-083 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Control Systems Engineer] [Rationale: Provide flexible interface options] [Status: Draft] The control system shall support operation via iOS/Android tablets (App version ≥1.0) and a dedicated panel with identical functionality. [Acceptance Criteria: Feature parity test; response time ≤2 s.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying platforms, version and performance criteria ensures interface consistency.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The crew shall monitor the control system using smart devices.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-084 (v1.0) [Priority: Low] [Source: Stakeholder: Crew Lead] [Rationale: Enable remote monitoring] [Status: Draft] The crew shall monitor the control system via a smart device app supporting alerts, status dashboards, and control logs. [Acceptance Criteria: App connectivity ≥99% uptime; dashboard load time ≤3 s.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Defining app features and performance metrics ensures effective remote monitoring.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The crew shall be able to control the facility via smart devices.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-085 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Crew Lead] [Rationale: Provide mobile control capability] [Status: Draft] The crew shall control facility systems (HVAC, lighting, alarms) via smart device app with secure authentication. [Acceptance Criteria: Command execution latency ≤2 s; authentication success rate ≥99%.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Including security and performance criteria makes mobile control requirements testable.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The monitoring system shall include a fire-suppression system.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-086 (v1.0) [Priority: High] [Source: Stakeholder: Safety Officer] [Rationale: Integrate fire suppression for hazard mitigation] [Status: Draft] The monitoring system shall include an automated fire-suppression system capable of discharging within 10 seconds of smoke detection, covering all protected zones. [Acceptance Criteria: Discharge test within 10 s; coverage validated per NFPA 13.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Specifying response time, coverage standard and acceptance criteria ensures the system’s effectiveness.

requirement_completeness.requirement_text: The potable water system shall feature a visible display of pH level.
requirement_completeness.suggested_improvement: REQ-087 (v1.0) [Priority: Medium] [Source: Stakeholder: Environmental Engineer] [Rationale: Provide real-time water quality visibility] [Status: Draft] The potable water system shall include a visible pH display with range 0–14, accuracy ±0.1 pH units, and update interval ≤1 minute. [Acceptance Criteria: Calibration test; display update verified in ≤60 s.]
requirement_completeness.rationale: Adding display accuracy, range and timing makes the requirement specific and testable.
